lead_paragraph: LAVENSTEIN--Eleanor, (nee Pomerantz), on July 15, 2016, age 100, of Chevy Chase, MD, formerly of Baltimore, MD, beloved wife of the late Arnold Lavenstein; loving mother of Dr. Bennett Lavenstein (Dr. Judith Gadol) and Richard Lavenstein; devoted sister of the late Doris Diamond; cherished grandmother of Carol Lavenstein and Robert Lavenstein; adored daughter of the late Benjamin and Ida Pomerantz. Eleanor Lavenstein was an accomplished pianist and pupil at Julliard of Josef and Rosina Lhevinne. Services at Sol Levinson & Bros., Inc., Baltimore, MD on Tuesday, July 19. Please omit flowers. Contributions in her memory may be sent to The Julliard School of Music, 60 Lincoln Center Plaza, New York, NY 10023-6588 or the Symphony of the Potomac, PO Box 717, Glen Echo, MD 20812. 1/3
